NP swab sample preparation.

1.    8.3µL of heat-inactivated NP swab samples was added with 1µL of Proteinase K

2.    Vortexed for 1 minutes.

4.    2µL of the treated sample is then used for RT-LAMP amplification.

 

RT-LAMP reaction (with ACTB internal control)

1.    Prepare 10X SARS-CoV2 S primer

Mix with 22µL of water, 2µL for F3(100µM), 4µL for B3(100µM), 8µL for FIP(PM)(100µM), 8µL for BIP(PM)(100µM), 8µL for FIP(tPM-1)(100µM), 8µL for BIP(tPM-1)(100µM), 4µL for LF(100µM) and 4µL for LB(100µM), 16µL for s

Measure via FAM channel (Ex:450/90, Em:515/30).

 

quasiOnePot Cas12a reaction (with ACTB internal control)

1.    Pre-complex Cas12a RNP by mixing 0.75µL of S2(+4DNA)(5µM), 0.75µL of S6(+4DNA)(5µM) and 7.5µL of enAsCas12a(100ng/µL)

2.    Incubate RNP at 37ºC for at least 15minutes.

3.    Prepare RNP-probe

Mix with 32µL of water, 7.5µL of 10X Tango Buffer, 1.5µL of Cy5-Quencher reporter(10µM) and 9µL of complexed RNP.

4.    Pipette 50µL of Cas12a-probe

Fluorescence detection can be done at Ex: 640/Em: 670.

 

RT-LAMP reaction (Lateral Flow reaction)

1.    Prepare 10X SARS-CoV2 S primer

Mix with 22µL of water, 2µL for F3(100µM), 4µL for B3(100µM), 8µL for FIP(PM)(100µM), 8µL for BIP(PM)(100µM), 8µL for FIP(tPM-1)(100µM), 8µL for BIP(tPM-1)(100µM), 4µL for LF(100µM) and 4µL for LB(100µM), 16µL for s

Flow readout)

1.    Pre-complex Cas12a RNP by mixing 0.75µL of S2(+4DNA)(5µM), 0.75µL of S6(+4DNA)(5µM) and 7.5µL of enAsCas12a (100ng/µL).

2.    Incubate RNP at 37ºC for 30minutes.

3.    Prepare Cas12a-probe
6.    Pipette 75µL of HybriDetect assay buffer (Milenia Biotec) into the reaction

Mix from Step 5.

7.    Insert dipstick into reaction
